flavor.reason: The flavor of the dishes was inconsistent, with some items being highly praised while others were bland or improperly prepared.

freshness.reason: Freshness was generally acceptable, but there were notable issues such as slimy shrimp and cold sides.

service.reason: Service experiences varied, with some diners praising the staff while others reported slow or inattentive service.

environment.reason: The ambiance and decor were well-received, with a modern design and unique historic setting.

value.reason: The pricing was considered high for the inconsistent quality, though some found the ambiance and certain menu items justified the cost.
